data.name: AcsNameClaimType
data.value: http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/nameidentifier

data.name: BinarySecurityTokenEncodingType
data.value: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-soap-message-security-1.0#Base64Binary

data.name: BinarySecurityTokenNs
data.value: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd

data.name: BinarySecurityTokenValueType
data.value: http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2009/11/swt-token-profile-1.0

data.name: CannotReadToken
data.value: Cannot read token. If you are using SWT, make sure to configure SimpleWebTokenHandler. Token: {0}

data.name: ClaimValueEmpty
data.value: Claim value cannot be empty

data.name: DefaultNameClaimType
data.value: http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name

data.name: ExpectedAudienceUri
data.value: The Audience Uri of the incoming token is not expected. Expected AudienceUri is

data.name: HandlerCannotReadToken
data.value: Handler cannot read this token.

data.name: IssuerNotTrusted
data.value: The Issuer of the token is not trusted. Trusted issuer is

data.name: MalformedElement
data.value: The <add> element is malformed. The right format is: <add issuerIdentifier=\"issuer identifier\" name=\"issuer friendly name\"

data.name: MissingIssuerIdentifier
data.value: The <remove> node should have a issuerIdentifier attribute

data.name: MissingServiceNameAttribute
data.value: The <remove> node should have a serviceName attribute

data.name: NoOAuthToken
data.value: No OAuth token was available to the service for authentication.

data.name: NotImplemented
data.value: Not implemented

data.name: OnlyOneXmlElement
data.value: There should be only one xml element as the configuration of this class

data.name: RawTokenNullOrEmpty
data.value: rawToken is null or empty

data.name: SignatureVerificationFailed
data.value: Signature verification of the incoming token failed.

data.name: SwtIncorrectlyFormed
data.value: The received token is not correctly formed

data.name: SwtMustHaveSignature
data.value: The Simple Web Token must have a signature at the end. The incoming token did not have a signature at the end of the token.

data.name: SwtNoAudienceUri
data.value: Then incoming token does not have an AudienceUri.

data.name: SwtNoExpiryTime
data.value: Then incoming token does not have an expiry time.

data.name: SwtNoIssuer
data.value: Then incoming token does not have an Issuer

data.name: SwtNoSignature
data.value: Then incoming token does not have a signature

data.name: SwtUnexpectedTimeFormat
data.value: The incoming token has an unexpected expiration time format

data.name: SwtWrongType
data.value: The received token is of incorrect token type. Expected SimpleWebToken

data.name: TokenExpired
data.value: The incoming token has expired. Get a new access token from the Authorization Server.

data.name: TokenTypeIdentifier
data.value: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2010/07/identitymodel/tokens/SWT

data.name: TopElement
data.value: The top element of the configuration should be named 'trustedIssuers'
